issue.title: [R] Add methods for modifying Schemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11589](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11589). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
$<~~, [[<~~, and (probably) [<- methods. We have the extracting versions implemented but not the updating ones, and that would be useful.

Motivating use case: schema detection for a dataset misreads a column, so take the autodetected schema, modify one field, and then re-create the dataset with the correct schema.
